name: Only Society: Arena
description:
Only Society Arena is an MOBA game which players will play in a third person view with choosing either in team ranger or team rogue to defend each base.
Damaging the player health to empty will stun the player.


Knocking out the player from the platform will eliminate the player regardless the health.
Watch out when attacking where friendly fire is a part of the fun.


Host is able to decide the total players up to 10 in the game and restriction is not limited at the moment.
Keyboard Controls:
W - Forward
S - Backward
A - Strafe Left
D - Strafe Right
Space - Jump
Shift - Sprint
Right Alt - Evade on directions
Left Mouse - Light Attack
Right Mouse - Heavy Attack
Tab - Gameplay Settings
F10 - Interface Settings

Recommended Controller Settings:


~The founder is recruiting new explorer to expand the society~

So, start rolling your sleeves and be a part of the Only Society!
